element-citation.article-title: Regulation (EC) No 1334/2008 of the European Parliament and of the Council. On flavourings and certain food ingredients with flavouring properties for use in and on foods and amending Council Regulation (EEC) No 1601/91, Regulations (EC) No 2232/96 and (EC) No 110/2008 and Directive 2000/13/EC
